RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 4. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUESTION AUTHORITY unhurried early, shifted out on the turn, circled his field six wide under left handed urging to make the lead before the furlong marker and drew off under a hand ride. CAT'S CURIOSITY vied for the early lead along the inside, also angled out on the turn, loomed boldly five wide in upper stretch then was no match for the winner. COLONEL MIKE allowed to settle, split horses two wide through the stretch and finished with good courage. KEYED ON TOP pressed the pace five then three wide into the stretch and was outfinished. LOCK ON pressed the pace four then two wide into the stretch and weakened late. SPECTACULAR ROAD away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Question Authority
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, circled field 6 wide, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Cat's Curiosity
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, angled out turn, loomed boldly 5 wide, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Spectacular Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace upper stretch, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Colonel Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, split horses 2 wide mid stretch, good try

ENTRY.NAME: Lock On
ENTRY.OWNER: Haehn T R and Molumby John
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 4-2wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Keyed On Top
ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Frank F Romocean
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 5-3wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 21600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 4. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 4 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPEEDY MOBILE forwardly placed from the start, responded with a rapid move three wide to make the lead entering the far turn, set the balance of the pace and drew off under mild left handed urging. BEAT THE DEALER trailed into the far turn, closed determinedly three wide through the stretch and finished second best. YOU'RE MY BOY BLUE chased the early pace two wide, was in tight between rivals midway on the far turn, steadied and angled outward, came on again into the stretch then was outfinished. TURNING PAGES away alertly, set the pace along the inside, drifted out a bit on the far turn, had speed into the stretch then weakened. MURRY SPUR close up near the inside, angled out on the far turn, entered the stretch five wide then weakened late. TIDE RISING was no factor. THE RIDER OF YOU'RE MY BOY BLUE LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF SPEEDY MOBILE FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AT THE THREE EIGHTHS POLE. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Murry Spur
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up inside, angled out 2nd turn, weakened 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: You're My Boy Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2wide, in tight 5/16pole, steadied, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Beat the Dealer
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed determinedly 3 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Mobile
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, quick move 3 wide 2nd turn, drew off, left urging

ENTRY.NAME: Tide Rising
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Turning Pages
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, inside, drifted out 5/16pole, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 4 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEZA HANDFUL never far back, rallied three wide through the far turn to make the lead at the top of the stretch and drew off under strong handling. NOT A GAME away alertly, set a pressured pace inside rivals to the top of the stretch then was no match for winner while well clear for second. BEYOND MY DREAMS pressed the pace three then two wide into the stretch and faded late. MASTER OF WAR passed tiring rivals. BIG FRANK hopped at the start and failed to menace. WINWITHJIMMY pressed the early pace two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond My Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Game
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace top lane, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Frank
ENTRY.OWNER: Lady Smith Stable LLC and Sayban Don
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Handful
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 3 wide 2nd turn, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Winwithjimmy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Master of War
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 20000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 4. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET EMPIRE stalked the pace along the inside into the turn, rallied to make the lead past the quarter pole, drifted from the three to the five path and drew off late under brisk handling. CONGRATS JENSEN sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set the pace off the rail for a half, was carried out to the six path then couldn't handle the winner but gamely held on for second. PROPHETESS never far back, finished with good courage five wide in the nine path. WHERETHERE'SSMOKE pressed the pace three wide into the stretch, was carried out to the seven path then outfinished. CHECK OUT LINE within range, drew closer in the eight path through upper stretch, angled inside the winner late and finished determinedly. CRISTALINDA trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied inside turn, drifted 5path, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Congrats Jensen
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace off rail, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Check Out Line
ENTRY.COMMENT: within range, advanced 8path, angled in late, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Cristalinda
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Wherethere'ssmoke
ENTRY.OWNER: Huffman Candance M and Fisher James
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Prophetess
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 5 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 4 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE COACHMAN sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set all the pace and widened at will through the stretch to win as much the best under a hand ride. JOE BRRRR unhurried early, closed willingly four wide through the stretch and got up for second. JOYFUL CANDY dropped inside leaving the chute, saved ground into the stretch then found his best stride late three wide. JOCKO ROAD passed tiring rivals. UPTOWN GUY pressured the winner two wide into the stretch then weakened late. KAPHAVATA vied for the lead three wide into the stretch and gave way in the final stages. PERFECT PICTURE had good early speed four wide and was through after a half. DUDLEY settled mid pack, advanced along the rail into the stretch then came up empty. WHISKEY SUNRISE was no threat. FANELLI was no factor. COAL TOWN ROAD had speed into the turn then wilted. THE WILD FLYER suffered a broken reign on the turn and and lost contact with his field.

ENTRY.NAME: The Coachman
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Kaphavata
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Jocko Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Dudley
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: The Wild Flyer
ENTRY.COMMENT: broken equipment, lost contact

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Picture
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, 4 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Sunrise
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Fanelli
ENTRY.OWNER: Longball Stable Fanelli John and Zoumas Nicholas
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Joe Brrrr
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed willingly, 4 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Joyful Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped inside quickly, trailed, best stride late 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Coal Town Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed turn, wilted

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 91. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 4 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE COOKIE MAN away alertly, set all the pace, edged clear before the furlong marker, drifted out when put to a left handed whip nearing the wire and prevailed. CRAFTY CONQUEST pressured the winner two wide, checked behind that one nearing the wire and finished second best. GEHRIG close up early, dropped back on the turn then came on again along the rail through the stretch. BLAME IT ON EDDIE unhurried early, altered course to the seven path at the top of the stretch and closed a gap late. ARTIE MY BOY well placed, failed to respond. UNYIELDING was no factor. ATTUCK away alertly, was a sharp threat three wide through the turn then weakened. CALL PAPA trailed. THE RIDER OF CRAFTY CONQUEST LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN DEEP STRETCH, AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Artie My Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Unyielding
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Gehrig
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, dropped back turn, came again rail

ENTRY.NAME: The Cookie Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drifted out nearing wire, held well,

ENTRY.NAME: Blame It On Eddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, altered course 7path, late gain,

ENTRY.NAME: Call Papa
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Attuck
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and TEC Racing (Elliott S Logan)
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, speed 3 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Crafty Conquest
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, checked nearing wire, jockey claimed foul,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 104. Allowance Purse 40900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of $25,000 Since February 4 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Highest Earnings 2022-23 Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIP HIP HOORAY with the second flight along the inside, rallied two wide into the stretch, made the lead, drifted in when put to a right handed whip at the furlong maker then finished full of run under left handed urging while drifting out to win as much the best. UOTTALIKEIT sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace along the inside into the stretch, checked inside the winner as that one drifted in at the furlong marker, altered course to the five path and finished clear for second. CHIEF RANDEL never far back, finished with good courage in the six path. MO DONT NO allowed to settle, offered a mild bid along the inside into the stretch then leveled off. TO WIN close up early, swung wide and lost ground. IT'S YOUR CALL was no factor. THEDAYOFTHEGREY chased the pace through the turn then gave way. THE RIDER OF UOTTALIKEIT LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR INTERFERENCE IN DEEP STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED HIP HIP HOORAY AND PLACED HIM SECOND.

ENTRY.NAME: Uottalikeit
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace top lane, shut off 1/8p, claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: Thedayofthegrey
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline Robert C and Wilkinson Richard M
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Hip Hip Hooray
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, rallied 2w, drifted in right urging 1/8p, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Dont No
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: To Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, swung wide, lost ground,

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Randel
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well 6path

ENTRY.NAME: It's Your Call
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 4 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foa ls Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: R CARDINAL PRINCE allowed to settle, raced two wide through the turn, drifted out to the six path entering the stretch, angled inside the drifting CONSIDER ME near mid stretch, closed fast in the six path through the final stages and was along in time. SCRATCHOFF away alertly, set the pace until deep stretch and held on for second. CONSIDER ME was bumped at the start, chased the pace two wide into the stretch, drifted out in front of the winner near the furlong marker to the six path then was outfinished. SUPER BROTHER offered a mild bid three wide on the turn then failed to sustain that bid. HUNTERTOWN was bumped at the start, trailed early and passed tiring rivals through the stretch. PRIVATE CONNIE bore in at the start bumping his inside rival, had sped along inside into the turn then faded. ARCHARCH CAT chased the pace two wide then along the inside and was through after a half. SWELTER was no factor. BOURBON TALKING also bore in at the start bumping HUNTERTOWN, was forwardly placed, in tight between rivals entering the turn causing his rider to steady and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Consider Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased 2 wide, drifted 6p uppr stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Private Connie
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, inside speed, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Huntertown
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Talking
ENTRY.OWNER: Quarter Pole Investments LLC and Fletcher Kevin
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, in tight 7/16pole, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: R Cardinal Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 2w, advanced top lane, angled in 6path, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Archarch Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Scratchoff
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace late stretch, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Swelter
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Hertrich III Frederick
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Super Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,
